>
[Knight Captain's Lance](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1573)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 90</row>

**Price** 3,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Lance](/Weapons.aspx?ID=28)
</row>

**Access** Knights of Lastwall have access to this item.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The appearance of this beautifully crafted _+2 [disrupting](/Equipment.aspx?ID=294) [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [lance](/Weapons.aspx?ID=28)_ changes to match the armor of its wielder. It has a cloth flag attached behind the lance point that displays whatever heraldry the wielder wishes. If a cavalier with the [Cavalier's Banner](/Feats.aspx?ID=1920) feat takes the knight captain's lance, it instead automatically displays the banner of their pledge.
